text.jpText: うおっ！？　な、何だ今の？
text.enText: Whoa! What the hell was that?

text.jpText:
お……おおおっ！？
何かよくわかんねーけど、力が溢れてくるぜ！
text.enText:
Oh… Oh! I don't know what it is, but 
it's giving me so much strength!

text.jpText:
無性にカッ飛ばしてぇ！！
いっちょ走って峠でも攻めにいくか！
text.enText:
I can't wait to get back on the 
road! I think I'll go for a run 
and hit some mountain passes!
